text: @ProfKarolSikora Talking to a virologist I know they said you need to have a high enough dose of covid19 to get your T cells to make immunity otherwise your 2 other natural immune defenses stop it first. So without a vaccine (inactive covid) you can’t have herd immunity. 🤷‍♀️ any comments
